News.Title: Neutral Digital Develops 3D Animation for Scandinavian Airlines' New Mumbai Route
News.Summary: Maxposure's subsidiary, Neutral Digital, has created a 3D animation for the launch of Scandinavian Airlines' new route to Mumbai. The animation is likely to be used as part of the promotional campaign for this new flight service.

News.Title: Maxposure Partners with ASG for Wireless IFE Solution Distribution
News.Summary: Maxposure has entered into a partnership with Miami-based ASG to market its wireless in-flight entertainment (IFE) solution, AeroHub, in the Americas market. This collaboration aims to expand the reach of Maxposure's IFE technology in the aviation industry across North and South America.
